name: The Root of All Evil
description:
Trees are taking over the world and the flying axe has to stop them! Flick your mouse to damage the trees. Flicking faster gives quadratically more points and damage!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kdv46y_zTD
Development took a bit less than 3 hours, was also livestreamed on Twitch.. Uses Kenney royalty-free Particle Pack and font "Moon Get!"

In retrospect, I should have increased the movement speed ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
